alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Toombs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Toombs and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Alston, or 11 miles southeast of Mount Vernon, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Uvalda, Santa Claus, Alston, Center, Toombs Central, Ohoopee, New Branch, McNatt Falls, South Thompson, Grays Landing, Rock Springs, Cedar Crossing, and Johnson Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
